name: Entropy (itch) (gamesdisk)
description:
When every action you take brings the world closer to crumbling, is there anything you can do to stop it.

WASD: Move
Left Shift: Run
Space: Jump

Check out the Dev Log of this project: Comingssoon

 Songs used:  from the OSTJam Vol2
28 - Haruspex - In Their Entropic Beauty

Some Textures Used:  https://3dtextures.me/
